short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the predicted score when watching live football live streaming football
short.vi: Tính tỉ số dự đoán khi xem trực tiếp bóng đá live streaming football

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the Chrome app! mbscore.tv ... This application helps you as a troll application to give random scores of matches like Queens Park Rangers vs Watford, Athletic Club vs Real Sociedad, Real Betis vs Granada, Almería vs Girona, and many other matches.

Setting :

Open Chrome browser.
Visit the Chrome Web Store.
Search for "live streaming football" in the search box. 
Select the "live streaming football" widget and press the "Install" button.

Use:

Select the match you want to see fun predictions for from the list of available matches.
